Text: Oh man!!! This game is so dear to my heart...the hours and hours of my life that it took! lol But now I have a new mistress....ESV...sorry Oblivion...you've grown older, your boobs are sagging, your hair is graying...I need a younger, sexier lover and Elder Scrolls V gives me what you can't. lol

XD!! Well, Skyrim blows my computers specs out of the water, so I must humble myself with the good ole Elder scrolls lol.
Thanks for this ^__^
